org.fest.swing.fixture
Class JTreeFixture

java.lang.Object
  org.fest.swing.fixture.ComponentFixture<JTree>
      org.fest.swing.fixture.JTreeFixture

public class JTreeFixture
extends ComponentFixture<JTree>

Understands simulation of user events on a JTree and verification of the state of such JTree.

Author:
Keith Coughtrey, Alex Ruiz

Creates a new JTreeFixture.

treeName - the name of the JTree to find using the given RobotFixture.

ComponentLookupException - if a matching JTree could not be found.

selectPath

public final JTreeFixture selectPath(TreePath treePath)
Select the given path, expanding parent nodes if necessary. TreePath must consist of usable String representations that can be used in later comparisons. The default <classname>@<hashcode> returned by Object.toString() is not usable; if that is all that is available, refer to the row number instead.

Parameters:
treePath - A path comprising an array of Strings that match the toString()'s of the path nodes
Returns:
this fixture.
